title: what is the passing marks for passing 1st sem n will i be able to pass it  with like really low prep

comments.body: 35 is passing but brother i Highly suggest do anything, Break a leg but pass. These subjects become Hard as fuck to pass later in backlog. Number of people who pass in Backlog is not even 10% of total backlog exam attendees. Whatever it takes. Just pass the subject. Especially maths or electrical.
Try till the exam, because recovering your gpa again is going to be difficult
How many people generally give backlog?
So around 40-50 fail maths everytime. And if i combine all subjects then around 90-100 ish people will have backlog in at least one subject per batch. So just multiply that by 3 or 4 batchesÂ
Study...you have physics and chemistry. I found Engineering math 1 the toughest of all. Everything else is up to how hard you find them lol. I struggled with computers, and electrical/electronics.
